!Fishermen's Guild Member: In the Giants Cave, if you hunt *halingkas, paliotes, kranrots, gamlins, leoguls, lesser giant scouts, lesser giant shooters, lesser giant mages, lesser giant elders, beast lords, beast seers, or Barif's pets*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
